data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of directors of the Company at their meeting held on May 26, 2022 has noted/ approved the following :-1. Standalone and Consolidated Independent Auditors Report for the Financial year ended 31st March, 2022;2. The Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 together with Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Cash Flow Statement as on that date;3. Statement in the form of declaration that the report of Auditor is with unmodified opinion with respect to Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022.The Meeting of Board of Director''s Commenced at 12:00 noon and concluded at 1.50 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Approval Of Audited Financial Results For The Quarter / Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of directors of the Company at their meeting held on May 26, 2022 has noted/ approved the following :-
1. Standalone and Consolidated Independent Auditors Report for the Financial year ended 31st March, 2022;
2. The Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2022 together with Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Cash Flow Statement as on that date;
3. Statement in the form of declaration that the report of Auditor is with unmodified opinion with respect to Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022.

The Meeting of Board of Director''s Commenced at 12:00 noon and concluded at 1.50 p.m.

This is for your information and record.
